data.title: Fantasy Anime Dub Casting Thread
data.meta_description:
Wait, is this legitimate or still just casting we're hoping for?
Hoping for.

 	 		 		Final Fantasy XIII



 “Lightning” – Mena Suvari

:sad:
data.text:
Do you disapprove of Lightning having the same voice actress as Aerith?

No. I disapprove of Mena Suvari. But, meh. Who knows? Maybe she would do better as Lightning.

No. I disapprove of Mena Suvari. But, meh. Who knows? Maybe she would do better as Lightning.

Haha, fair enough. My second choice would be Kari Wahlgren.

REBORN!

Tsuna Sawada - John Burgmeier

Hayato Gokudera -

Takeshi Yamamoto -

Kyoya Hibari - Jason Liebrecht

Lambo - Brina Palencia (child), Travis Willingham (adult)

Mukuro Rokudo -

Reborn - ?, Illich Guardiola (adult)

Mrs. Sawada (Nana) - Laura Bailey

Ken Joshima - John Burgmeier

Haru Miura -

I originally planned to do an LA cast, but as you can see, I changed my mind. I'll try to think of more to fill in the blanks.

If CN were to have an original anime. Based on DC Character; The Flash

New Adventures of The Flash

subtitle; Life on the Fastlane​

due to his speed​

Johnny Yong Bosch: Wally West (The Flash)

Yuri Lowenthal: Kid Flash​

Animation by;

Production I.G or

Studio Gonzo​

Pokémon

Ash: Nancy Cartwright

Misty/Dawn: Tara Strong

Brock: Joe Alaskey

Jessie/May: Grey DeLisle

James/Tracey: Maurice LaMarche

Meowth: Richard Horvitz

Max: Pamela Hayden

Gary: Rob Paulsen

Professor Oak: Billy West

Delia: Tress MacNeille

Supporting cast: Bob Bergen, John DiMaggio, Phil LaMarr, Dan Castellaneta, Russi Taylor, Tom Kenny, Carlos Alazraqui, Frank Welker

Okay, yeah, I know squat about the anime voice acting industry. But if this was the type of cast they could get for "Pokémon", I swear I'd watch the dub every single week, cultural edits be damned.
